name: Mobsteroids Vendetta
description:
A twin-stick shooter game about Bob the Alien taking his revenge against the space mafia.

Sources used:

Used https://jfxr.frozenfractal.com/ for sound effects

jfxr. (2020). Frozen Fractal. https://jfxr.frozenfractal.com/ Accessed 10 / 3 / 2021

Free Music Archive used for background music

Free Music Archive: Serge Quadrado - Mafia. (2019, May 21). Free Music Archive. Retrieved October 20, 2021, from https://freemusicarchive.org/music/serge-quadrado/simple-jazz/mafia
